mapper.sql: ID, IMP_TIME, IMP_USER, BATCH_ID, ORG_ID, KJYEAR, KJMOTH, KJYEAR_MOTH, SUBJECT_CODE, SUBJECT_NAME, HBZL, QCJFYE, QCDFYE, BQJFFSE, BQDFFSE, BNJFLJ, BNDFLJ, QMJFYE, QMDFYE, ZTZB, FX, account_port_type
mapper.delete: delete from T_KMYE where KJYEAR_MOTH = #{yearMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and account_port_type = #{accountPortType,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into T_KMYE (ID, IMP_USER, BATCH_ID, ORG_ID, KJYEAR, KJMOTH, KJYEAR_MOTH, SUBJECT_CODE, SUBJECT_NAME, HBZL, QCJFYE, QCDFYE, BQJFFSE, BQDFFSE, BNJFLJ, BNDFLJ, QMJFYE, QMDFYE, ZTZB, FX, account_port_type) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.impUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kjyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kjmoth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kjyearMoth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hbzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qcjfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.qcdfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.bqjffse,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.bqdffse,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.bnjflj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.bndflj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.qmjfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.qmdfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.ztzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.accountPortType,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update T_KMYE
IMP_TIME = #{impTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IMP_USER = #{impUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATCH_ID = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KJYEAR = #{kjyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KJMOTH = #{kjmoth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KJYEAR_MOTH = #{kjyearMoth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJECT_NAME = #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HBZL = #{hbzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QCJFYE = #{qcjfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QCDFYE = #{qcdfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BQJFFSE = #{bqjffse,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BQDFFSE = #{bqdffse,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BNJFLJ = #{bnjflj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BNDFLJ = #{bndflj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QMJFYE = #{qmjfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QMDFYE = #{qmdfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZTZB = #{ztzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FX = #{fx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_port_type = #{accountPortType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_KMYE set IMP_TIME = #{impTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IMP_USER = #{impUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCH_ID = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KJYEAR = #{kjyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KJMOTH = #{kjmoth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KJYEAR_MOTH = #{kjyearMoth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT_NAME = #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HBZL = #{hbzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QCJFYE = #{qcjfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QCDFYE = #{qcdfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BQJFFSE = #{bqjffse,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BQDFFSE = #{bqdffse,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BNJFLJ = #{bnjflj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BNDFLJ = #{bndflj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QMJFYE = #{qmjfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QMDFYE = #{qmdfye,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZTZB = #{ztzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FX = #{fx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_port_type = #{accountPortType,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update T_KMYE set FORMAT_FLAG='${formatFlag}' where ID='${id}'
